Name: Leave It To Me No.1
Ingredients: 10 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Gin, apricot, vermouth and lemon create an old-fashioned but well-balanced drink.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Leave It To Me No.1 contains 141 calories
